main event: Several personnel observed two unidentified aircraft coming from the north and heading in a southerly direction at a very high altitude near Nouasseur Air Base in French Morocco on July 7, 1952.
interesting points: The objects appeared to be much larger than the jet aircraft stationed at the base.
The objects made a sharp right turn and disappeared into the clouds.
The sighting lasted for approximately 15 minutes.
The top surface of the objects appeared to have a dull grayish color with a steady glare of light.
The objects were estimated to be approximately twice as large as the jet aircraft at the base.
The objects showed no signs of any propulsive jet or other exhaust system.
